body:
Day 10 - Manga 181*
Random, well drawn, shit made worse by the censorship that covers half of the pages.
6/10.
An art book with nothing of interest again 4/10
One of the most unique hentai ever developed.

This was the first Hentai I ever read/saw, like 20 years ago I think. I remember being astonished by its quality and subtle gradients of skin tones. Now looking at it, I believe I could "posterize" it (reduce # of unique colors) to a small number- its the curves that imply said shading.   Yep, besides the gradient in the red tuxedos, you can easily get away with 7 colors and not notice a difference if you add more.  Neat!
